attributes.action: A public demand for the PM to reverse his decision to veto the changes on the EU's Lisbon Treaty
attributes.additional_details: A public demand for the PM to reverse his decision to veto changes to the EU's Lisbon Treaty and to sign up and support these changes to the Lisbon Treaty. These proposed changes are imperative to the economic recovery of Eurozone and EU countries (including the UK) and must be adopted.
